page.title: 19LIFE STYLES IN TIMSBURY
page.content: Local people were asked about their lifestyle.The most popular form of heating in houses was coal.Oil was less used.Gas and electricity were equally popular. Elderly people shop in the village,but middle-aged people tend to go to Bath,Midsomer Norton or Keynsham. Supermarkets are very popular,but not hypermarkets. Again, elderly people have their hair done either in the village,or have someone come to their home to do it. Some people do their own hair,or even go into town to have it done. Most people were not born here.All but one liked living here. Left-handed people seem to be less popular than right-handed.The people I interviewed were only keen on the one sport of swimming. {By Johanna and Penny.
